alert.note: Alert for Coffee; Dale (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 5:29PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Dale and northeastern Coffee Counties through 600 PM CDT... At 529 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles south of Brundidge to near Ariton. These storms were nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ariton, Java, Roeton, Greater Salem Church, Clowers Crossroads, Frisco, Hwy 231 Pea River Bridge and Rocky Head. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
